remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Sharpen effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SharpenEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SharpenEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SharpenEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Sharpen effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SharpenEffect.Amount
member.summary: How much to sharpen the image. Default value 0, range 0 to 10.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SharpenEffect.Threshold
member.summary: Adjusts which parts of the image are sharpened. Default value 0, range 0 to 10.
